original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Anumānapañha
analyzed: anumāna pañha

original: Nippapañcavagga
analyzed: nippa pañca vagga

original: 2. Khīṇāsavabhāvapañha
analyzed: khīṇāsava bhāva pañha

original: “Bhante nāgasena, tumhe bhaṇatha—
analyzed: bhante nāgasena tumhe bhaṇatha

original: ‘yo gihī arahattaṁ patto, dve vāssa gatiyo bhavanti anaññā, tasmiṁyeva divase pabbajati vā parinibbāyati vā.
analyzed: yaḥ gihī arahattam pattaḥ dve vā assa gatiyaḥ bhavanti anaññā tasmiyeva divase pabbajati vā parinibbāyati vā

original: Na so divaso sakkā atikkametun’ti.
analyzed: na saḥ divasaḥ sakkā atikkametunti

original: Sace so, bhante nāgasena, tasmiṁ divase ācariyaṁ vā upajjhāyaṁ vā pattacīvaraṁ vā
analyzed: sace saḥ bhante nāgasena tasmin divase ācariyam vā upajjhāyam vā patta cīvaram vā

original: na labhetha, api nu kho so arahā sayaṁ vā pabbajeyya divasaṁ vā atikkameyya, añño
analyzed: na labhetha api nu kho so arahā sayam vā pabbajeyya divasam vā atikkameyya aññaḥ

original: koci arahā iddhimā āgantvā taṁ pabbājeyya vā parinibbāyeyya vā”ti?
analyzed: koci arahā iddhimā āgantvā tam pabbājeyya vā parinibbāyeyya vā ati

original: “Na so, mahārāja, arahā sayaṁ pabbajeyya, sayaṁ pabbajanto theyyaṁ āpajjati, na ca
analyzed: na saḥ mahā rāja arahā sayam pabbajeyya sayam pabbajantaḥ theyyam āpajjati na ca

original: divasaṁ atikkameyya, aññassa arahantassa āgamanaṁ bhaveyya vā na vā bhaveyya, tasmiṁyeva
analyzed: divasam atikkameyya aññassa arahantassa āgamanam bhaveyya vā na vā bhaveyya tasmiya eva

original: divase parinibbāyeyyā”ti.
analyzed: divase parinibbāyeyya ati

original: “Tena hi, bhante nāgasena, arahattassa santabhāvo vijahito hoti, yena adhigatassa jīvitahāro bhavatī”ti.
analyzed: tena hi bhante nāgasena arahattassa santa bhāvaḥ vijahitaḥ hoti yena adhigatassa jīvita hāraḥ bhavati iti

original: “Visamaṁ, mahārāja, gihiliṅgaṁ, visame liṅge liṅgadubbalatāya arahattaṁ patto gihī tasmiṁyeva divase pabbajati vā parinibbāyati vā.
analyzed: visama mahā rāja gihi liṅga visame liṅge liṅga dubbala tāya arahattam pattaḥ gihī tasmiyeva divase pabbajati vā parinibbāyati vā

original: Neso, mahārāja, doso arahattassa, gihiliṅgasseveso doso yadidaṁ liṅgadubbalatā.
analyzed: na isaḥ mahā rāja dosaḥ arahattassa gihi liṅgassa iva īsaḥ dosaḥ yat idam liṅga dubbala tā

original: Yathā, mahārāja, bhojanaṁ sabbasattānaṁ āyupālakaṁ jīvitarakkhakaṁ visamakoṭṭhassa mandadubbalagahaṇikassa avipākena jīvitaṁ harati.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja bhojanam sabba sattānam āyu pālakam jīvita rakkhakam visama koṭṭhassa manda dubbala gahaṇikassa avipākena jīvitam harati

original: Neso, mahārāja, doso bhojanassa, koṭṭhasseveso doso yadidaṁ aggidubbalatā.
analyzed: na isaḥ mahā rāja dosaḥ bhojanassa koṭṭhassa iva īsaḥ dosaḥ yat idam aggi dubbala tā

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, visame liṅge liṅgadubbalatāya arahattaṁ patto gihī tasmiṁyeva divase pabbajati vā parinibbāyati vā.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja visame liṅge liṅga dubbala tāya arahattam pattaḥ gihī tasmiyeva divase pabbajati vā parinibbāyati vā

original: Neso, mahārāja, doso arahattassa, gihiliṅgasseveso doso yadidaṁ liṅgadubbalatā.
analyzed: na isaḥ mahā rāja dosaḥ arahattassa gihi liṅgassa iva īsaḥ dosaḥ yat idam liṅga dubbala tā

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, parittaṁ tiṇasalākaṁ upari garuke pāsāṇe ṭhapite dubbalatāya bhijjitvā patati;
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja parittam tiṇa salākam upari garuke pāsāṇe ṭhapite dubbala tāya bhijjitvā patati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, arahattaṁ patto gihī tena liṅgena arahattaṁ dhāretuṁ asakkonto tasmiṁyeva divase pabbajati vā parinibbāyati vā.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja arahattam pattaḥ gihī tena liṅgena arahattam dhāretum a sakkontaḥ tasmiya eva divase pabbajati vā parinibbāyati vā

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, puriso abalo dubbalo nihīnajacco parittapuñño mahatimahārajjaṁ labhitvā khaṇena paripatati paridhaṁsati osakkati, na sakkoti issariyaṁ dhāretuṁ;
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja purisaḥ abalaḥ dubbalaḥ nihīna jaccaḥ paritta puññaḥ mahati mahā rajjam labhitvā khaṇena paripatati paridhasati osakkati na sakkoti issariyam dhāretu

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, arahattaṁ patto gihī tena liṅgena arahattaṁ dhāretuṁ na sakkoti, tena kāraṇena tasmiṁyeva divase pabbajati vā parinibbāyati vā”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja arahattam pattaḥ gihī tena liṅgena arahattam dhāretum na sakkoti tena kāraṇena tasmiyeva divase pabbajati vā parinibbāyati vā ati

original: “Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, evametaṁ tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.
analyzed: sādhu bhante nāgasena evam etam tathā sampaṭicchāmi iti

original: Khīṇāsavabhāvapañho dutiyo.
analyzed: khīṇāsava bhāva pañhaḥ dutiyo
